title: Chapter 1051 - The Studio Of The Heart
body:
Chapter 1051 - The Studio Of The Heart

In Profound Sky Academy, the flying serpent beat its wings. Baleful mists churned as the power of the formation spread outward, shaking the entire stretch of heaven and earth. It was fierce beyond measure.

Su Yi swung his sword and attacked, free and unrestrained, forceful and tyrannical.

The distant onlookers were long since overcome with astonishment, and they fled further away.

Let’s try the Laws of Oblivion next! On a whim, Su Yi changed the Laws circulating around him. The electric sword qi unleashed from the Profound Lightning Golden Bamboo Staff was instantly as boundless and overflowing as a current, with the weight of a primordial divine mountain.

When struck by the aura of oblivion, it was as if the soul and body were sinking into an endless abyss, unable to break free.

It was just as Su Yi anticipated. He’d achieved small success in the Laws of Oblivion too, and they weren’t any weaker than the Laws of Rebirth!

Yet another Law capable of contending with the power of Spirit Nirvana!? The old man in hemp was completely stunned.

After all, in the stars beyond, Law capable of contending with the power of Spirit Nirvana were all the supreme powers of their respective star realms!

Mastering any one of them made you an inheritor of the “will of the heavens” within...
